name: GPX
description:
Description:
• Game is only 4kb without the MochiMedia ads! Do you miss those days when games were not so fun as now? Well, you just found the right game! You are the good airplane, and need to shoot the red airplanes, which they are not as good as you, also, collect flying coins in the sky! Be the one with the highest score around!

Instructions:
Move with Arrow Keys.
Perform an action with 'SPACE' key.

Game Dimensions: 500x300

Game Category: Action, Arcade, Other

Movement: Arrow Keys
Fire / Action: Spacebar Key
Jump: Not Available
